snippet.title: Capes - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2081080/Capes

Twenty years ago, the supervillains won.  

Since then they’ve created a dystopian city where developing super powers is a crime.  Nobody has managed to slow them down, until now.

Capes blends turn based strategy with a dark tale of super powers gone wrong.
